comment: Loved checking in daily to see previous years memories of the day and sharing them with family. Now having updated the feature is a bloated mess showing random unconnected days through the year. "Revisit this moment, Featured Friday, Remember this day".... Etc. All designed to keep me using the app for longer, but in reality actually turned me off using the feature altogether. It's an unnecessary addition. Going to try revert to an older version, if not I'll just give up.
scenarios: Checking daily to see previous years' memories of the day and sharing them with family.
Navigating through the updated feature that shows random unconnected days throughout the year (e.g., "Revisit this moment," "Featured Friday," "Remember this day").
Attempting to revert to an older version of the app due to dissatisfaction with the current feature.
key sentence: Navigating through the updated feature that shows random unconnected days throughout the year (e.g., "Revisit this moment," "Featured Friday," "Remember this day").
